text: Fritz Joachim Raddatz (3 September 1931 – 26 February 2015) was a German feuilletonist, essayist, biographer and romancier. In September 2014 Raddatz announced his retirement from active writing.Fritz J. Raddatz erklärt Abschied vom Journalismus, Die Welt, access date 26 February 2015 He was a bisexual. Raddatz, who was an advocate of Euthanasia, committed suicide at the age of 83 on 26 February 2015 in Zurich.Fritz J. Raddatz: Ein Genie und Provokateur, welt.de, access date 27 February 2015Der Literaturkritiker Fritz J. Raddatz ist gestorben, welt.de, access date 26 February 2015 He never wanted to become a nursing case. In full possession of his powers he decided: "That's it, it's enough." ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Bisexual people Category:German LGBT writers Category:Suicides in Germany Category:Writers from Berlin
